page.title: 11Swallownest Youth Club
page.content: The Youth Club started in September l984 and is appreciated by the young people of Aston and Swallownest. They have refreshments, music, snooker and other games. It is well attended and a regular meeting place for children from the ages of 9 to 16. 40 to 60 people attend the Youth Club every week. They can play card games and dance. Once every month the Youth Club holds a disco. If you are a regular attender you may have the chance to go on a Youth Club trip. You may go to different places like Alton Towers and Lightwater Valley. All of them cost money, but they are good fun. A youth club only takes up one night and is great fun. There is also a bar with refreshments like crisps, drinks and one-penny sweets. We hope that the Youth Club will continue in years to come.
